description.displayText: When we first met Mariana, it was at a play date. Even though Mariana was not taking care of our daughter but a friend's daughter, she took great care and paid attention to our (then infant) daughter. They had an immediate connection. Since then, we have often hired Mariana to take care of our daughter (now 26 months old). Mariana is honest, trustworthy, and gets along so well with children. (I trust very few people with our daughter, but I completely trust Mariana.)  She is kind and has a great personality. Most important, our daughter loves her and gets so excited whenever she comes over. I give the highest recommendations for Mariana!

description.displayText:
Mariana is my friend, I have known her for the past 10 years.
She is a very warm, caring person, flexible, punctual.
Mariana has a professional attitude, has a medical and teaching background and all the best qualities when it comes to babysitting. 
Mariana has worked for me in the past with my older son, 6 year old, and recently has babysat my 2 year old son, and I have always been very happy with her service. 
I highly recommend Mariana for caring for your children, she knows their language and this way she becomes their best friend immediately.

description.displayText: My husband and I employed Mariana to care for our children from September of 2012 to June of 2014.  She was the most wonderful addition to our household, and we are so grateful to have her in our lives. Mariana is incredibly responsible, hard-working, and punctual, but these are just the first of her many fine qualities. She is full of integrity and kindness, and her positive approach to life makes her a pleasure to be around. Mariana is intelligent, resourceful, and trustworthy, and I would recommend her as a nanny/babysitter without reservation.
